mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Samuel Huntington to Jabez Huntington, 1776 April 12
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Huntington, Samuel, 1731-1796
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Samuel Huntington, President of the Continental Congress and signer of the Declaration of the Independence, writes to Jabez Huntington, regarding preparations being made to prepare for the invasion of the British Navy. Letter mentions William Williams, another signer of the Declaration of Independence and Esek Hopkins, Commander of the Continental Navy. Autograph letter signed, 2 pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States -- History -- Revolution, 1775-1783
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Wayne Rickert Collection of Founders' Autographs
